description:
One of the most remarkable progresses that we have witnessed in the current era is the quick progress in the computer technology field which has augmented its dimensions day-by-day. This development has aided us in accelerating our lives’ productivity and advancing our fruitfulness.

The most crucial point, which may distinguish us from others by enhancing our productivity, is harmonizing ourselves with technology that will positively change our mentality to be on the bright path of life on which we can grow and progress. So, we have decided to perambulate alongside together by providing you the required backgrounds.

In the computer’s world, one of the hottest trends is related to the computer tricks. The companies manufacturing operating systems and software devise miscellaneous hidden paths in their products to bring about the users’ struggles in finding the best utilization of the computer products to surpass each other in this regard. 

In this package, you will learn sixty interesting computer tips and tricks which will be briefly introduced. To start with this course, a compilation of sixty tips and tricks has been provided for our students in three interesting subjects.

First, instruction of fifteen tips and tricks on the new and popular Windows 10:

Microsoft has made a lot of publicity by offering Windows 10 which indeed is not over nothing as the new windows’ version has been advanced with many new capabilities. In this section, we have concentrated on those tricks of Windows 10 which are more user-friendly in order to eliminate some of the users’ concerns, ranging from not facing any errors to the best way to hide our information.

Second,  instruction of 15 tips and tricks on Cortana:

In this section, we have tried to provide a comprehensive instruction about Cortana and her functions. If you are a fan of the computer games, you will definitely know that Cortana, Microsoft personal assistant in Windows 10, is named after the character playing as the artificial intelligence in the computer game named Halo. Cortana is able to send an email, make an appointment, tell a joke, and read poem to name a few.

Third, instruction of fifteen tips and tricks on Google:

Once we think of surfing on the internet, unconsciously Google is the first search engine that comes to our mind.

The Google super search engine is daily used by millions of people across the globe trying to gain some information from the internet. But, the point to be highlighted is that, how many of them are indeed aware of the Google’s various functions and how many of them know about the Google search tricks optimizing the employment of those functions.

Here is the place that the necessity of our course becomes transparent. So, be with us to be a Google power user as your companionship is our pride.

So, don’t worry and embark upon this journey with us and keep this statement in your mind that by ‘learning these tips and tricks you are always many steps ahead of others’.
title: 60 Computer Tips and Tricks
